茎頂: (けいちょう) - tip of a stem (of a plant)
茘枝: (れいし) - litchi (Nephelium litchi)/lychee/lichee/litchi nut; bitter melon (Momordica charantia)/bitter gourd; Thais bronni (species of muricid gastropod)
茘枝貝: (レイシガイ) - Thais bronni (species of muricid gastropod)
茜: (せん) - Madder , madder (especialmente madder japonês, Rubia argyi); madder (red color)
茨: (ibara) - espinho, arbusto espinhoso; rosa-brava, silva; espinho; ponta
茨の冠: (いばらのかんむり) - a crown of thorns
茨城県: (いばらきけん) - Ibaraki prefecture (Kanto area)
茨姫: (いばらひめ) - Sleeping Beauty; Thorn Princess; Briar Rose
茫々: (ぼうぼう) - wide expanse of flat surface (e.g. sea, plains); endless; rampant growth of (weeds, hair)
茫然: (ボーゼン) - dumbfounded; overcome with surprise; in blank amazement; in a daze
茫然自失: (ぼうぜんじしつ) - (yoji) stupor; stupefaction; trance; (being) dumbfounded
茫茫: (ぼうぼう) - wide expanse of flat surface (e.g. sea, plains); endless; rampant growth of (weeds, hair)
茯苓: (ぶくりょう) - Poria cocos (species of basidiomycete used in Chinese medicine)
茱萸: (グミ) - oleaster (any plant of genus Elaeagnus); silverberry (US)
茶: (chá/sa) - tea , tea; tea plant (Camellia sinensis); tea preparation, making tea
茶々を入れる: (ちゃちゃをいれる) - to tease; to make fun of
茶きん: (ちゃきん) - tea cloth; tea napkin
茶しぶ: (ちゃしぶ) - tea incrustation; tea stains (on teeth, cups, etc.)
茶せん: (ちゃせん) - tea whisk/bamboo whisk for making Japanese tea; hair style where the hair is tied up in a bundle on the back of the head (resembling the shape of a tea whisk)
茶づけ: (ちゃづけ) - chazuke; cooked rice with green tea poured on it
茶にする: (ちゃにする) - to make fun of/to look down on/to make light of; to take a tea break/to rest
茶わん: (ちゃわん) - rice bowl; tea cup; teacup
茶を濁す: (ちゃをにごす) - to evade (questions); to reply evasively; to beat around the bush; to throw up a smoke screen.
茶事: (さじ) - tea gathering (for the tea ceremony); some matter concerning tea; family tea gathering held in memory of deceased ancestors
茶事七式: (ちゃじしちしき) - seven styles of tea ceremonies
茶人: (さじん) - master of the tea ceremony; person with eccentric tastes
茶入: (ちゃいれ) - tea container (usually for thick tea used at the tea ceremony)
茶入れ: (ちゃいれ) - tea container (usually for thick tea used at the tea ceremony)
茶利: (ちゃり) - funny word or gesture; funny part (in a puppet show, kabuki, etc.); a woman's temple hair
茶化す: (ちゃかす) - to poke fun at; to make fun of; to send up
茶名: (ちゃめい) - tea name (name bestowed upon a tea ceremony practitioner)
茶器: (ちゃき) - tea utensils; container for powdered green tea (tea ceremony)
茶壷: (ちゃつぼ) - tea jar; tea urn
茶壺: (ちゃつぼ) - tea jar; tea urn
茶室: (ちゃしつ) - tearoom; tea house; tea-ceremony room; tea arbour; tea arbor
茶寮: (さりょう) - tea-ceremony room/tea-ceremony hut; restaurant/coffee shop/cafe
茶封筒: (ちゃぶうとう) - brown envelope; manila envelope
茶屋女: (ちゃやおんな) - woman employed in a restaurant, teahouse or teahouse offering sexual services
茶屋酒: (ちゃやざけ) - liquor consumed in a teahouse
茶巾: (ちゃきん) - tea cloth; tea napkin
茶巾ずし: (ちゃきんずし) - gomokuzushi wrapped in a thin layer of fried egg
茶巾寿し: (ちゃきんずし) - gomokuzushi wrapped in a thin layer of fried egg
茶巾寿司: (ちゃきんずし) - gomokuzushi wrapped in a thin layer of fried egg
茶巾鮨: (ちゃきんずし) - gomokuzushi wrapped in a thin layer of fried egg
茶席: (ちゃせき) - tea room; tea ceremony
茶引き草: (チャヒキグサ) - wild oat (Avena fatua); wild oats
茶懐石: (ちゃかいせき) - simple meal eaten before tea is served
茶抽出物: (ちゃちゅうしゅつぶつ) - tea extract
茶挽き草: (チャヒキグサ) - wild oat (Avena fatua); wild oats
茶挽草: (チャヒキグサ) - wild oat (Avena fatua); wild oats
茶掛け: (ちゃがけ) - hanging scroll in a tea-ceremony room
茶断ち: (ちゃだち) - giving up or abstaining from tea
茶杓: (ちゃしゃく) - bamboo tea spoon for making Japanese tea
茶柱: (ちゃばしら) - upright-floating tea stalk (considered a lucky omen)
茶柱が立つ: (ちゃばしらがたつ) - to float upright in the cup (of a tea stem, as a sign of good luck)
茶柱虫: (チャタテムシ) - psocid (any insect of order Psocoptera, which includes booklice)
茶棚: (ちゃだな) - shelf on which tea and tea implements are kept
